title.abbrev: O/R Addresses in the X.500 DIT

front.title: Representing the O/R Address hierarchy in the X.500 Directory Information Tree

abstract.t: This document defines a representation of the O/R Address hierarchy in the Directory Information Tree. This is useful for a range of purposes, including:
o Support for X.400/RFC 822 address mappings,.
